citeinfo.title: Bedrock Cross Sections, Western Gun Flint Trial, Minnesota, 2011

descript.purpose: Publication shows the locations of mapped bedrock outcrops, structural measurements, and interpretations of bedrock geology in both map view and along 5 vertically exaggerated cross- sections. Ancillary materials include explanation, correlation diagram, and figures showing regional geologic setting, contact metamorphic zonation, mapped and inferred outcrop, stylized stratigraphic section with depositional interpretation, index map relative to 7.5-minute quadrangle maps and the approximate outlines of recent forest fires; and simplified geology showing sites of geologic and scenic interest. The latter is included on the map plate (M-191.pdf) to serve both the geologic and broader naturalist user communities.
